title: Google Pixel 9a full specs and price tag revealed in new leak
description: Google might launch the Pixel 9a in March 2025, but a full specs sheet of the smartphone already appeared online. Multiple sources told Android Headlines that the new phone will have a big 6.3" display, which is the same screen from the Pixel 9 and Pixel 9 Pro flagships. Google is expected to equip the Pixel 9a with its latest Tensor G4 chipset, coupling it with 8 GB RAM and 128 GB or 256 GB storage. The leak also confirmed once again the 5,000 mAh battery, which will support up to 18W wired and 7.5W wireless charging. The new phone is expected to have the 48 MP Sony IMX787 sensor...

text: Google might launch the Pixel 9a in March 2025, but a full specs sheet of the smartphone already appeared online. Multiple sources told Android Headlines that the new phone will have a big 6.3" display, which is the same screen from the Pixel 9 and Pixel 9 Pro flagships. Google is expected to equip the Pixel 9a with its latest Tensor G4 chipset, coupling it with 8 GB RAM and 128 GB or 256 GB storage. The leak also confirmed once again the 5,000 mAh battery, which will support up to 18W wired and 7.5W wireless charging. The new phone is expected to have the 48 MP Sony IMX787 sensor in its main camera that is also in the Pixel 9 Pro Fold. Alongside it will be a 13 MP ultrawide snapper, and a 13 MP selfie camera inside a punch hole at the front. Dimentions of the Google Pixel 9a are 154.7 x 73.3 x 8.9 mm with a body that weighs 186 grams. The larger battery and display will not affect the price; once again, it will begin from $499, just like its predecessor. Source
html:
Google might launch the Pixel 9a in March 2025, but a full specs sheet of the smartphone already appeared online. Multiple sources told Android Headlines that the new phone will have a big 6.3" display, which is the same screen from the Pixel 9 and Pixel 9 Pro flagships.

Google is expected to equip the Pixel 9a with its latest Tensor G4 chipset, coupling it with 8 GB RAM and 128 GB or 256 GB storage. The leak also confirmed once again the 5,000 mAh battery, which will support up to 18W wired and 7.5W wireless charging.

The new phone is expected to have the 48 MP Sony IMX787 sensor in its main camera that is also in the Pixel 9 Pro Fold. Alongside it will be a 13 MP ultrawide snapper, and a 13 MP selfie camera inside a punch hole at the front.

Dimentions of the Google Pixel 9a are 154.7 x 73.3 x 8.9 mm with a body that weighs 186 grams. The larger battery and display will not affect the price; once again, it will begin from $499, just like its predecessor.

Source
